EmailTemplate.name: Case Closed _JP-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: 【Thank you very much】from DAZN
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!IF(Account.Partner_ID__c == "",Account.FirstName, "DAZN for docomo user")},
We hope your issues have been attended to by our customer service team, and you are enjoying your DAZN experience. We have now closed your inquiry ID:{!Case.CaseNumber}.
If you are still experiencing any difficulties, please feel free to visit our Help page or contact our customer service team directly. We would be happy to help.
Assisting our DAZN users is our top priority.
Privacy Policy https://my.dazn.com/help/jp-en/privacy
Terms of Use https://my.dazn.com/help/jp-en/terms
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
